description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. An alien race has been receiving transmissions from a far away planet and its your job to help them successfully navigate the solar system to Earth, but watch out for some surprises along the way, the Earthlings are not as friendly as the aliens first thought... Includes global leaderboards.  A BBQ Games Charity Title - 50% of profits from each sale will go to the Micheal J Fox Foundation.
